website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful faucet at a budget-friendly price. It's hard to beat the value.
pros: Swivel works well even after prolonged use
cons: Installation instructions are hard to follow

customer_reviews.title: **Make sure to order the plate that goes under it**
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four stars because it does not come with the plate that goes under it and there is not a good alert to tell you to order that with it. So I got ready to install it and then had to go to Lowes and get the metal plate that goes under it. I think most people need the little plate thing and so it should either come with it or include some sort of alert that you need to get one. Otherwise, it looks fine and works fine so far, but it has only been installed for three weeks so we will report if we have problems.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this kitchen faucet is amazing. My friends have come over and sworn that I paid $200 for it. It has a great design and it's very heavy looks like amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: When it's cheap...it's cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It worked one evening. One. Evening. By the next morning, the water pressure inexplicably weakened and the faucet dribbled once shut off. What made it worse is that I had to pay a plumber to install it due to a hand injury. Don't be dazzled by the price, this thing is garbage. If you're like me—looking for an inexpensive faucet because you know you have to pay for installation—just wait and keep saving your pennies for a faucet of better quality. At least then if you have to pay the plumber too, it won't be wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cap

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Our kitchen faucet sprung a leak so I bought this one. Since the hook up was identical the VCCUCINE was easy to install. Only hard part was getting all tubing through the black mounting washer. I got them through by screwing the mounting washer clockwise while pushing. Product is well built stainless steel so very sturdy. Good value, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This seemed ok when we bought it, but the sprayer sprung a leak at the threads after using it for 8 months. The plastic threaded part is very weak. Not worth the effort it was to replace the whole faucet just to have it fail in 8 months. We bought a new sprayer piece, but the threads failed in that as well. My recommendation is to spend more on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Solved a problem
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer part will work with the base of other brand models. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. P.

customer_reviews.title: You cant return it after 30 days for any circumstance
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our kitchen and we bought the faucet held on to it until the day came for install. After installation, it leaked. drip drip, drip drip, once you think the leak was fixed use it for a few times and noticed drips of water. It was coming from the factory crimp on the cold water line. I wanted to return it or send it back for a replacement but I had already had it for the past 30 days. It was a small leak so calcium build up eventually filled the pinhole, however if I ever get a water softener, which I wanted to, the leak is likely to come right back.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney roche

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is more heavy duty than I thought for the price. Came nicely and securely packaged. Each piece nestled into foam packing shapes for the item. Although not yet installed I don't foresee any problems as it is a straight forward install. Will be changing out current faucet in my trailer's kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good but not EOM
customer_reviews.text: Not a true replacement for Kohler spray head but good temp fix till we update kitchen. Really easy install. Narrow diameter hot & cold hoses cause water to come out way to forcefully when using spray function. Splashed all over when trying to rinse dishes in sink.
customer_reviews.author: Tshark

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old faucet for half the price! It included everything even a screw driver! Highly reccomend! I dont have a dish washer so the sprayer and removable head are a must. Done plenty of dishes with no issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: ashley natali

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 faucets but both are broken after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two faucets in March and both faucets are broken in August. They last for 5 months. The product is cheap, however it’s expensive to install it. If you are handy, it may not be an issue. But if you have to have a plumber to install the faucet, buy a good quality one so it would last longer. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jie Wen

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this faucet was surprisingly easy to install, and seemingly works perfectly. We purchased it to replace a similar faucet that was not working even after replacing the cartridge, and were worried the process would require special tools. Not only were no special tools needed, but the effort required was minimal thanks to click-in connectors and built-in washers and gaskets. Very pleased with this product and will definitely recommend it to others looking for a similar kitchen faucet.
customer_reviews.author: clouderati

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these faucets 1 for the kitchen 1 for my camp and the other one for my old camper. Pretty easy to install if you follow the steps. and the water flow is very good
customer_reviews.author: wonderer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was nice.
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice looking. I like the design and feel...I was not happy that the putty plate was missing from the package...since I didn't want to return it, I accepted Amazon partial refund of 13usd....I used that to buy a putty plate separately.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine FAIN

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The first one we ordered was missing parts, so was the second one. Although it looked like it might be a good faucet, we had to go with a different brand. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yaine

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a great price. I returned it only because I realized the finish wouldn't work with the sink basin...total oversight on our end.
customer_reviews.author: EllieBean

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY!!--HAPPY!!  GREAT PRODUCT & WORKS AND LOOKS JUST FINE!!!
customer_reviews.text: A WONDERFUL REPLACEMENT FAWCETT.......IT EVEN HAS MORE WATER PRESSURE THEN THE OLD ONE!!! WELL MADE & GREAT PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I brought it about 5 month this is already broken Very bad quality please don't waste your money to buy this one rather buy from home depot because this one doesn't let you contact seller after purchase and you can get warranty
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.. $75 cheaper than home depot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... only issue I had was the water supply to the faucet they provide was 2" too short. I bought some extenders for $4 a piece at home depot and corrected that issue. Love it! Pressure is great
customer_reviews.author: SQUIRT GODDESS

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Fix
customer_reviews.text: This was a great faucet. Didn't think I'd have to replace it for at least a few years. Lasted 15 months then snapped off while rinsing dishes😳
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The handle won't lock in place. It just wiggles around. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen faucet
customer_reviews.text: Nice nickel finish and feels like good quality. Only con is the faucet head doesn’t stay on the neck that great.
customer_reviews.author: VuuFam

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement faucet. Easy installation. All parts were included and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: John l Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful sprayer but when on regular output he texture of stream seems like it’s not like when we put it in. Not sure what the issue is. Also drips a little after turning it off. It works fine tho. Wish I made another choice but too expensive to have plumber come again.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieWR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our basement bar and ended up buying another for our kitchen. Great price and nice style.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this faucet 5 stars. Very easy to clean, works very well, looks nice. The faucet is a bit smaller than a full size kitchen faucet, but worked out very well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Drips
customer_reviews.text: When you cut the water off it drips for a while!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the sprayer pulls out. Easy to install. I spent more time taking out the old faucet than it took me to install the new one
customer_reviews.author: Lu Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well after initial problem
customer_reviews.text: Just had installed and water pressure low so I unscrewed end and then blew out air and some debris and then put back on and good water pressure now.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality so far. The sprayer has almost to much power but that’s better than not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T.

customer_reviews.title: Strong sprayer pressure
customer_reviews.text: Very simple installation; fit perfectly as we have limited space with a window sill just above the faucet; above average pressure from the hand-held sprayer; met all expectations with the sprayer pressure a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: COL

customer_reviews.title: The box was missing the deck plate that holds the faucet
customer_reviews.text: The faucet came with an important part missing from the box- the deck plate that holds the faucet itself.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys S.A.

customer_reviews.title: quick
customer_reviews.text: it was just as I was expecting and quick shipping, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: rich schornstheimer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This looks and acts just like my last kitchen faucet, which was almost twice the price. I like these pull-out sprayers, and the height-- although I like the look of higher sprayers, I've had no success with them-- they splatter water all over the place. This height and angle is just right, and it's convenient to pull out and put back the handle. The brushed nickel finish doesn't show fingerprints. Simple installation and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Space Salamander

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is really nice. The brushed nickel is a nice upgrade from the chrome that I had before. It came packaged nicely and the installation was simple and straightforward. I love the sprayer built into the faucet that is removable! It makes cleaning the sink and washing leftover food down the garbage disposable a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, our old faucet wouldn't stay on the spray option and dripped, this one is about ther exact same as our older one and works great. Was pretty easy to install minus the parts my husband had to go buy to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Just got this sink in and really love the look. This is an updated version of the one I currently have and although we haven't installed it yet I am super excited to. Will update once we do!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DiGuglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Decent faucet, but somewhat small. I prefer the long spout ones, but this was perfect for my basement sink!
customer_reviews.author: G REAL REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet was very easy to install, and the functionality is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Lewis

customer_reviews.title: vey good cwality ,
customer_reviews.text: use this fixture in kitchen sink .very happy works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VCCUCINE Commercial Stainless Steel Single Handle Pull Out Sprayer Brushed Nickel Kitchen Faucet, Small Pull Down Bar Sink Faucet
feature_bullets: ✅MODERN DESIGN: sleek kitchen faucet design make your kitchen room minimalism and fresh, and it creates the cleanest look, easy to match all decorating style.
✅DIMENSIONS: spout reach 7.1", spout height 5.5", overall height 7.9".
✅POWERFUL FUNCTION: 2 sprayer setting button between spray and stream, spray mode perfect for rinsing, aerated stream perfect for filling water.

✅FEATURE BENEFITS: brushed nickel finish for resists tarnish and corrosion; sleek look ceramic disc cartridge ensures drip-free performance; pull down spray wand providing a 20-inch flexible hose reach for ease of use; 360 degree rotation: offers more room for a variety of sink activities.

✅EASY INSTALLATION: quick installation tool included, 3/8" H & C water hoses & 1/2" adapters included (Fits Both 3/8" and 1/2" Water Supply System), more options. (If there is any question, please feel free to email us via Amazon, we will answer you in 24 hours. )

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
